title: PBE Sign Up Issues
body:
Well basically when i go to the PBE sign up page located here: https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe
 I attempt to access the sign up function through the "I want to help!" button each time I get an Error 500.
Can any rioter or community member please tell me how I can find a way to fix the error?

Last thing:  New Yordles plz {{champion:78}}

replies.body:
Ah, this error is quite tricky! So, the steps below should resolve this issue:

1. First, use [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to clear your browser's cache and cookies.
2. Visit the [**NA Landing Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) and login to your account from here
3. Visit the [**NA PBE Signup Page**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)

You should encounter no issues now. Let me know if that is not the case.

It is still giving me the same issue after I clear my cookies and cache. I then attempted to use a different browser (as I use Google Chrome) so I switched to Mozilla Firefox logged in and still encountered the same problem.
https://gyazo.com/1536ceb5ac4ab7d91114ec7824ef59d7

It must be a routing issue to that page then. In this case, using a VPN such as [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) or [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) should resolve this issue. Simply activate the VPN service, then try visiting that page again.

I hope this helped!

I am so happy to say that after I installed Cyberghost I could finally apply for the PBE so i'd like to thank you so very much for your assistance and if I am accepted I cannot wait to start helping and giving feedback. Thank you so much!
